name: CloudOps
description: Repository containing source code for building Salsify's cloud infrastructure. Includes CloudFormation templates for AWS resources (VPC, IAM, Redshift, Glue, SQS), Kubernetes manifests for ops workloads, Packer builds for AMI creation, Jenkins pipeline scripts, and various operational tools for cost tagging, credential rotation, and SOC compliance reporting.

name: Amazon Machine Image
description: Pre-configured virtual machine images used for launching EC2 instances. In Salsify, AMIs follow the naming convention 'salsify-<purpose>-<env>-{{timestamp}}' and are built using Packer. Examples include k8s-stag for Kubernetes staging and awslinuxgolden for general AWS Linux golden images.

name: Virtual Private Cloud
description: AWS networking construct used to isolate Salsify's cloud resources. CloudOps contains CloudFormation templates for VPC infrastructure including ops_vpc_infrastructure.json, vpc_infrastructure_v1.json, and vpc_infrastructure_v2.json, as well as VPC peering configurations.

name: Identity and Access Management
description: AWS service for managing access to cloud resources. CloudOps contains IAM CloudFormation templates including iamk8s.json for Kubernetes access, and tools for auditing IAM MFA status and user access keys.

name: Security Operations Center / SOC Compliance
description: Security compliance and audit tools in CloudOps for SOC reporting. Includes scripts for tracking GitHub members, Jenkins deploys, production deploy parsing, RDS users, and staging environment parsing to support security audit requirements.

name: Extract, Transform, Load
description: Data pipeline pattern used in Salsify's analytics infrastructure. CloudOps contains AWS Glue CloudFormation templates including salsify_page_event_reporting_etl.json for processing page event data.

name: Infrastructure Management
description: Automated deployment system that releases Kubernetes manifest changes to infrastructure on PR merge to master. Used by CloudOps for deploying applications like infra-temporal.

name: Infrastructure Temporal
description: An ops workload running on Kubernetes that is automatically released via infra-mgmt when CloudOps PR changes are merged to master.

name: CloudFormation Linter
description: Tool used in CloudOps to validate CloudFormation templates against AWS specifications. Configured as a pre-commit hook to automatically lint changes to the cloudformation/ directory.

name: Multi-Factor Authentication
description: Security feature for AWS IAM users. CloudOps includes audit_iam_mfa.sh script to audit MFA status for IAM users.

name: Relational Database Service
description: AWS managed database service used by Salsify. CloudOps includes tools for adding AWS IP blocks to RDS instances (add_aws_ip_blocks_rds_instance.sh), getting RDS credentials, and tracking RDS users for SOC compliance.

name: Simple Queue Service
description: AWS messaging queue service. CloudOps contains CloudFormation templates for SQS configuration in the cloudformation/sqs directory.

name: Elastic Block Store
description: AWS block storage service for EC2 instances. CloudOps includes tag_helper_ebs.rb for cost tagging EBS volumes.

name: Elastic Compute Cloud
description: AWS virtual server service. CloudOps includes tools for cost tagging EC2 instances and certificate formatting for EC2 (format_cert_ec2.rb).

name: Simple Storage Service
description: AWS object storage service. CloudOps includes tag_helper_s3.rb for cost tagging S3 buckets.

name: Elastic Load Balancer
description: AWS load balancing service. CloudOps includes update_elb.rb script for managing load balancer configurations.

name: Security Assertion Markup Language
description: Authentication standard used for AWS single sign-on. CloudOps includes aws_saml_provider_update.rb for updating SAML provider configurations.

name: Certificate Signing Request
description: Request for SSL/TLS certificates. CloudOps includes csrgen.sh script for generating certificate signing requests.
